info.name: Masteranime DeepDark
info.description:
Watch anime in a bright room with a dark theme. May the dark be kinder on thine eyes. (Masteranime dark theme)

This is a dark theme for masteranime inspired by FT DeepDark.

Also, credit where credit is due for the color palettes. (@KDE, @horst3180, @linuxmint, Firefox, YouTube and Discord)

Official GitHub page, with screenshots, available here.
